author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Prince William says his mum taught him ‘everyone has potential to give something back’
text:
Summary by Ground News The 41-year-old gave an emotion-filled speech on Thursday (14.03.24) night. He told an audience at the Diana Legacy Awards at the Science Museum, London. Added his mum taught him that everyone in need deserves a supporting hand in life. Share menu 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
PerthNow Prince William says his mum taught him ‘everyone has potential to give something back’ In an emotional speech at an awards set up in her memory, Prince William said his mum Princess Diana taught him “everyone has the potential to give something back”.
2 hours ago · Perth, Australia Read Full Article
